named-query.name: findBuildingById
named-query.query: select distinct building from Building building where building.id = :id

named-query.name: findRoom
named-query.query: select distinct room from Room room where room.building.id = :buildingId and room.roomNumber = :roomNumber

named-query.name: findPositionHint
named-query.query: select distinct positionHint from PositionHint positionHint where positionHint.hintText = :hintText

named-query.name: findAssetBySerialNumber
named-query.query: select distinct asset from Asset asset where asset.serialNumber = :serialNumber

named-query.name: findAssetByInventoryNumber
named-query.query: select distinct asset from Asset asset where asset.inventoryNumber = :inventoryNumber

named-query.name: findAssetByMacAddress
named-query.query: select distinct asset from Asset asset where asset.macAddress = :macAddress

named-query.name: findFixtureByLocation
named-query.query: select distinct fixture from Fixture fixture where fixture.room.id = :roomId and fixture.positionHint.id = :hintId
